title: Stress-induced stabilization of the photoactive FAPbI3 phase under ambient conditions without using an additive approach
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00092G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shivam Porwal, Nitin Kumar Bansal, Subrata Ghosh, Trilok Singh
This work provides a novel strategy for stabilizing additive-free α-FAPbI3 phase and fabricating FAPbI3-based perovskite solar cells under ambient conditions.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
